title: 3 Simple Ways to Upload and Post GIFs on Discord Desktop

steps.title: Navigate to a server or DM.
steps.content: Navigate to a server or DM. You can use the Discord desktop application or in a web browser at https://discord.com/ .

steps.title: Click GIF.
steps.content: Click GIF . This is on the right side of the text field, between the Gift Nitro and Stickers icon. [1] X Research source A pop-up menu will open.

steps.title: Search for a GIF to use.
steps.content: Search for a GIF to use. On the GIFs homepage, you'll see popular categories. Click one to open the GIFs in that category, or enter keywords into the search bar at the top of the menu.

steps.title: Click a GIF.
steps.content: Click a GIF. This will send the GIF immediately. If you need to delete a GIF, hover over the GIF or message and select ••• . Then, click Delete Message .

steps.title: Navigate to a server or DM.
steps.content: Navigate to a server or DM. You can use the Discord desktop application or in a web browser at https://discord.com/ . Use this method to upload and share a GIF saved onto your computer.

steps.title: Click +.
steps.content: Click + . This is on the left side of the text field.

steps.title: Click Upload a file.
steps.content: Click Upload a file . A pop-up window will open.

steps.title: Select your GIF file and click Open.
steps.content: Select your GIF file and click Open . Alternatively, you can drag and drop the GIF file directly into the text field. You'll see a preview of your GIF in the text field.

steps.title: Press ↵ Enter on your keyboard.
steps.content: Press ↵ Enter on your keyboard. This will send your GIF.

steps.title: Navigate to a GIF.
steps.content: Navigate to a GIF. You can use websites such as https://giphy.com/ or https://tenor.com/ to find GIFs online.

steps.title: Right-click the GIF.
steps.content: Right-click the GIF. A drop-down menu will open.

steps.title: Click Copy image address.
steps.content: Click Copy image address . This is different from Copy Image , which will save the GIF as a PNG or JPEG (still image) file. On some GIF-hosting websites, you'll need to click their Share link to get the GIF link.

steps.title: Navigate to a server or DM.
steps.content: Navigate to a server or DM. You can use the Discord desktop application or in a web browser at https://discord.com/ .

steps.title: Paste the link and press Enter.
steps.content: Paste the link and press Enter . This will send the GIF.
